meanings.definition: Of or relating to a crystal system characterized by three unequal axes intersecting at oblique angles.
meanings.sent1: The triclinic crystal structure has three unequal axes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the triclinic properties of the crystal.
meanings.sent3: The triclinic crystal decided it was tired of standing at oblique angles all day.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as triclinic as the crystal structure, intersecting at different angles.
meanings.sent5: The triclinic shape of the crystal made it unique among the others.

meanings.sent1: The geologist found a triclinic in the rock sample.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a beautiful triclinic in its collection.
meanings.sent3: The triclinic crystal rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a triclinic, full of different angles and perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The triclinic sparkled under the light, showcasing its unique structure.
